property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Giving a report with the help of an interpreter, Djibouti

note.text: There are several common causes of misinterpretation. An interpreter may not have sufficient language skills, but they may also suffer from a lack of professional training, or they may have a hidden agenda. The following behaviors may indicate misinterpretation:

- Large differences in sentence length between the two languages.
- Confusing reactions from your audience.
- Speech and nonverbal behavior that don't seem to match.
- Inconsistent use of terminology.
- Your interpreter's body language indicating discomfort.
